recipe.ingredients: - mixed berries (blueberries, strawberries, raspberries): 2 cups (fresh or frozen) - Greek yogurt (unsweetened): 1 cup - almond milk (unsweetened): 1 cup - spinach: 1 cup - chia seeds: 1 tablespoon - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - ice cubes (optional): 1/2 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: If using fresh berries, wash them thoroughly. If using frozen berries, there is no need to thaw them as they will help make the smoothie cold and thick. 2. Combine Ingredients: In a blender, combine the mixed berries, Greek yogurt, almond milk, spinach, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and ice cubes if desired. 3. Blend: Blend on high until the mixture is smooth and creamy. If the smoothie is too thick, you can add a bit more almond milk to reach your desired consistency. 4. Serve: Pour into glasses and serve immediately for the freshest taste and best texture.
